name: The Lighting Tower
description:
Welcome to my third Game Jam submission! The Lighting Tower!

Recommended to play in fullscreen

In this game you will have to survive the hordes coming from the sides and the constant lighting strikes coming from above. To do so you can buy upgrades and fix the walls from the sides.

Controls:

A and DMove side to sideSBuy item belowWBuy tower aboveQFix Left WallEFix Right WallSpaceUse meleeLeft ClickShoot with the gunMouseAim side to side

Let me know until when can you survive in the comments down below!
